price: Kitaaba kee dubbisi, Hardha ati mataan kee sirratti herregaa ta’uuf ga’aadha.
arabic: ٱقۡرَأۡ كِتَٰبَكَ كَفَىٰ بِنَفۡسِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ عَلَيۡكَ حَسِيبٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: iq'ra kitābaka kafā binafsika al-yawma ʿalayka ḥasīban
